attributes.action: protect the red breasted mergansers and goosanders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are red breasted mergansers and goosanders heavily persecuted just because they eat fish? How come birds like grey herons , other ducks, cormorants , shags are protected but these beautiful birds are being allowed to be shot ? This is truly non-sensical.
